summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas detailing account balances and transactions for the period from October 1, 2016, to October 31, 2016. It includes information on deposits, service charges, and account management procedures.
locations: St. Thomas, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $64,471.98 and an ending balance of $214,471.98 as of October 31, 2016.
A deposit of $150,000.00 was made on October 21, 2016.
The document outlines procedures for reporting errors in transactions and the timeline for addressing such issues.
There were no overdraft fees charged during the statement period.
The document is marked as confidential under Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 6(e).
